name: PLAY Everyday Lotion SPF 50 Face & Body Sunscreen
about: What it is:  A fast-absorbing, non-greasy, water and sweat-resistant, and broad-spectrum SPF 50 lotion for face and body...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness..Formulation: Lotion..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Sunflower Extract: Rich in beta carotene and helps protect your skin from external environmental elements..- Rosemary Leaf Extract: Has a calming effect on the skin and is rich in antioxidants...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free...What Else You Need to Know:  PLAY Everyday Lotion was created to correct everything you ever disliked about sunscreen. It feels amazing, absorbs quickly & has a fresh scent, plus it's never sticky or tacky. This beloved fan favorite also nourishes your skin & is non-comedogenic. Even kiddos enjoy applying it!
ingredients: -Sunflower Extract: Rich in beta carotene and helps protect your skin from external environmental elements.     ..-Rosemary Leaf Extract: Has a calming effect on the skin and is rich in antioxidants....Avobenzone 3%, Homosalate 10%, Octisalate 5%, Water, Polyester-8, Acrylates Copolymer, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Glycerin, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Isododecane, Lauryl Lactate, Cetyl Alcohol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Brassica Campestris/Aleurites Fordi Oil Copolymer, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Cetearyl Olivate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sorbitan Olivate, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Aniba Rosaeodora (Rosewood) Wood Oi, Chlorphenesin, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Flower/Leaf Extract, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Behenic Acid, Cetyl Behenate, Isostearyl Isostearate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Tocopherol, Allantoin, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Panthenol, Pentasodium Triphosphate, Citric Acid
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply generously and evenly 15 minutes before sun exposure..-Reapply at least every two hours or after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: no white cast that i can see (i am pale so take that with a grain of salt) it's also non greasy and works well under makeup! best spf product ive used so far!

reviews.review_text: It has no white cast and is hydrating, but it is not for oily or combination skin. It feels heavy and sits on top making the skin look very shiny/oily. Their unseen sunscreen is much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dark skin girl friendly!!!  No white cast and hydrating.  Don’t sleep girlies. Buy it.

reviews.review_text: perfection in a bottle it makes you look greasy at first but it is a one and done it is the only spf that defy school air.it is spectacular

reviews.review_title: A staple for sunny summertime fun!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product works. It smells like sunscreen, you can see it when you apply it, and there is a tiny bit of tackiness at the beginning. Give it a minute and that feeling will subdue. My partner likes it because it is visible and can be seen during application. I like it because I have not been burnt and felt my skin is protected. I have tattoos I don’t want to fade, I have scars I don’t want to deepen. This product has kept things realistically well persevered. Aging is natural, no magical cure. This product will serve its purpose for protecting you from sun damage at a reasonable rate. Recommended for active people. I apply this before bike rides, long walks, runs, and beach time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A friend recommended this to me because I hate the smell and feel of most sunscreens. First time I used it was great, it was matte, didn't look or feel greasy after application, and didn't smell overpoweringly of sunscreen afterwards. Second time I used it (less than a week after opening it), the lotion came out separated as a clear greasy liquid as well as chunks of lotion. Can't say I'd pass on the recommendation, sadly - especially for a product of this price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i always get really bad reactions from using sunscreen (my face get red and itchy) after using this it stopped!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry redness-prone skin and used this product over my moisturizer once to try it out and I found it sticky and tacky. I didn't want to give up on it, so I used it in place of my moisturizer and found the same thing. I really love the smell, but unfortunately, I have to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this spf to use on my body. I’ve had so many issues with different sunscreens in the past. Most sunscreens normally cause little itchy, red bumps to pop up all over my skin. I tried this in store, it went on smooth and didn’t cause any bumps. The sunscreen also has a bit of a lemony smell to it which is nice! I would recommend to anyone with reactive skin like myself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been buying this sunscreen for years, mostly because it leaves no white cast and I have a lot of super black tattoos. However, I didn’t realize how incredible it actually is until I went on vacation to the Caribbean. Everyone I was with was using drugstore brands of sunscreen and were burnt to a crisp - I didn’t have so much as a tan!! I wore it through water and hardly reapplied, everyone I was with couldn’t believe how well my sunscreen worked. I couldn’t believe it. I am very fair and never tan for reference. So all I can say is that this stuff absolutely works, even in the scorching sun and the water!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE my supergoop PLAY sunscreen. I went into Sephora to get SPF for my face and came out with the value size of this. I don't care what anyone says, this works the exact same for your face as the others do, and it's slightly cheaper!   Sure maybe it's not tinted or unseen, but it works just as well and does not break out my acne-prone skin. It's also nice for my dry/combination skin, it can be a little shiny when first applied but it gradually sinks into the skin keeping my face moisturized all day.  Plus it smells sooo good!!

Otherwise 10/10. Get the bigger size, it's Worth the buck. Oh it also helps with healing hyperpigmentation from the pimples. (Black skin)
Bonne hydratation/odeur mais ma crème a commencé à se séparer (huile/liquide) rapidement…

reviews.review_text: The product itself I had no issues with, sunscreen didn't leave my body feeling too sticky or anything, it was the bottle that caused so many problems! The lid for the value bottle does not stay on! I swear half of my bottle leaked out into my skin care pouch over the past couple of months. I finally decided to throw out the little I had left because it wasn't worth the trouble anymore. If youre someone who plans on carrying this bottle around with you, make sure its in its own pouch otherwise it might leak all over your other belongings. Really hope this is something they fix bc I do love the product itself :(

Truly a pleasure to use. I actually look forward to applying sunscreen in the mornings now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had lots of issues with this sunscreen. I usually wear a Korean sunscreen (not water resistant) as my daily sunscreen. But I’m a runner and when I run I need something that will stay on when I sweat. I have been using this for about a month. Oiliness isn’t a big concern when I’m running, but it’s clear that this wouldn’t work for me as a daily sunscreen because it makes me very shiny. But by far the biggest issue I have with this sunscreen is one I don’t fully understand - 3 or 4 times I wore this for a run, it turned a fluorescent yellow colour. My friend asked me what I had on my face because it looked like I had glow in the dark paint on my face. It also stained the collars of my shirts yellow. Not sure why it went yellow - it doesn’t do it every time, but it happened enough that I ended up throwing the rest in the trash. Strongly recommend skipping this one.

Even on it's own though, it's incredibly greasy and my face looks like an oil slick no matter how much I blot. It also makes me break out a bit. However, I've repurposed it for other body parts so that I still get some use out of it, and it doesn't have any white cast whatsoever, which is a major plus. This might be good for those who don't have oily skin and enjoy the lotion consistency.

reviews.review_text: I'm fond of some Supergoop products, so I purchased this thinking I was getting an economical option for face sunscreen, since this has a low cost per mL. I was wrong.  PROS - Works well for the body only. Thinner formula makes it easy to apply. - Smells nice, pleasant lemony scent (at the cost of potentially irritating your skin)  CONS - Absolutely unsuitable for the face. Very greasy and heavy. I could feel it sitting on my skin and it was so bothersome that I wanted to rub my face on a towel. - It contains unnecessary fragrance, which are orange peel oil and lemon peel oil. Citrus oils are co-sensitizing and don't improve the formula in any way, they are only added for scent. Dermatologist Dr Dray made a great video on citrus oils in skincare and how they are unnecessary and potentially irritating. In this PLAY sunscreen, ingredients are also listed half way down the list, which leads me to believe there is a considerable concentration of them added into the formula. This is also a Clean At Sephora product, which was misleading to me as it contains a hidden version of fragrance. - Product separates into white liquid with clear oil surrounding it. You must shake the bottle before dispensing. - Packaging. To fully tighten the lid, you have to screw it past the point where it is in line with the shape of the bottle, making it sit/store in a weird way. You also have to be careful when opening it as the product can flow out and cause a mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for a couple of months and while it’s not bad, it’s not great either. It’s greasy. It smells great but the grease is just intolerable. Literally look like if slathered in baby oil after using. And it clogs pores and causes outbreaks. While it’s a face/body combo and I’ve used it on both, I’m getting near cystic acne wherever I use it. Hard pass.

reviews.review_title: good SPF but the lid is rubbish and will leak,
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it's a good SPF, skin feels protected and moisturised but you're very aware that you have something sitting on your skin! I personally don't like the 'glow' that it gives and feel that you honestly look more sweaty! the lid is a load of rubbish and we've lost probably a third of the tube to it twisting off in bags and coming out (even being lid end up), will be decanting into a different bottle to use the rest!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use it for face and body when I’m not wearing makeup and have no problems but I feel that the Unseen Sunscreen is superior for going under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Never without sunscreen! I love this one.  It's great on the body, but I was worried that it wouldn't work very well on facial skin, but I've had no problems there.   It's true that it gives a shiny look that some may not like, but it's not greasy on the skin and I find that the shiny look dissipates after an hour or two.   I'm now on my second tube, using it on my face every day, and I've had no facial reactions, no pimples, no redness, and no milia.   So for me, it's a winner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. Although the price is quiete high, I prefer not to use regular body sunscreen for my face. Although this product is for face and body, It seems more fancy so I use it on my face. Anyway, this product is soothing and hydrating, and dosen't irritate the skin. Makeup goes super smooth over it, and the mix of products don't irritate the skin. Lastly, it feels very light weight. Really enjoy this product, and recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the feel of this on the back of my hand in-store, and even tried a small swatch under my eyes (where I always feel sensitivity first) before purchasing. I thought I'd like this, but it's a hard no for me!  First off I don't like the fragrance. I generally go fragrance-free, but not all fragrances bother me. I don't like this one. More importantly I hate how this looks and feels on my face!! I sinks in somewhat, but left me very shiny with a really weird sticky/greasy feel. At first I applied this over skincare, then washed it off and tried reapplying on it's own to see if that'd make it less sticky/greasy - it didn't. It's possible you may enjoy the finish if you apply it sparingly, but, this is sunscreen....  I also found it stung a bit around the eyes when I applied to my whole face, which has me wondering if I'm about to develop a reaction. It'd probably work well for people with dry skin who don't have sensitivities to chemical sunscreens or fragrance (hence two stars), but I just hate how this feels on my face.  I'm planning to return this eventually, but the nearest store is over an hour away, so I'm stuck with it for now.

reviews.review_title: Hell no. Pls invest in Asian SPF
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this on a recommendation from a friend. For me, the hype on this or any Supergoop spf has been completely unwarranted. The performance of this uv lotion has been abysmal.  Consistency:    Upon first buy, I perhaps received a faulty? batch because I could not get the spf to stop separating. It was not left in intense cold or heat; it was sealed prior to opening; I made sure to shake it well prior to administration. The formula barely held together, so I returned it for a new one. The second one was much better; it held together and was a fairly smooth lotion on application, as it's intended to be.  Scent:     Mild, spf-y scent that did not bother me, personally.  On Application:     Yes, stinging eyes. Yes, greasy residual feeling. Yes, mild cast.  TLDR; for price point to quantity to performance, this product is subpar. Do yourself a favour (ESP MY BIPOC FRIENDS!) and invest in an Asian spf. Your skin and bank balance will adore you for it. Eg. Rohto's Skin Aqua UV Moisture Gel, Beauty of Joseon's Rice Relief, Isntree's Water Sun Gel, Isehan's Mommy Mild UV Gel, Round Lab's Birch Juice Sun Cream (this last one is more pricey tbh), etc etc.

I love this sunscreen and it’s been months since i have it. It feels great and there aren’t little white pieces on my skin. But now i can see the sunscreen isn’t well mixed, so i have to shake it before i used it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I buy the value size and use it exclusively on my face (too expensive for a body sunscreen!). I have extremely dry skin and I love this sunscreen. It wears well under makeup and leaves my skin with a beautiful, dewy glow. You do need to occasionally shake it up to mix it, as it can start to separate.  I would say, if you have oily skin then this isn’t the product for you.

reviews.review_title: Preferred over the unseen sunscreen, never burned
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this when I went on vacation in Central America for 2 weeks. I have fair skin and I applied and re-applied this lotion max twice throughout the day and my face never burned. I also used it on my shoulders and neck. I was in the ocean playing in the waves and surfing so I would highly recommend this lotion especially since it's reef safe. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because my skin definitely became shiny with the feeling of a coating of sunscreen on it BUT it's pretty rare that this doesn't happen when applying sunscreen. I have combo skin and it never dried out or broke out and I preferred this to the unseen sunscreen just because I could see and feel where I put the sunscreen on my face. My eyes also burned a bit when in the ocean but was hard to tell whether that was because of salt water or sunscreen - I'd still buy it again purely for the fact that my skin tolerated it well and I never burned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite sunscreen for the body. I am very conscious of protecting my skin from the sun and picked this up before a week in Jamaica. It absorbs quickly but feels light and moisturizing. The scent is a big improvement compared to most other sunscreens. It's light and refreshing. I'll definitely repurchase this and wear it all summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This size lasts forever! It’s not overly greasy on my face and doesn’t clog my pores or break me out. It’s also non irritating so my skin isn’t on fire all day. Plus it’s lightweight enough that there is no cast no matter where you apply and the scent isn’t overwhelming. The consistency is almost liquid-y/serum-y so you have to be mindful when you squeeze it out. I find that a single finger’s worth is good enough for my face. A must-have for tan-or-darker skin.

I love that this sunscreen doesn’t leave a white cast and blends quickly without feeling very greasy or having a heavy scent. I notice after a couple hours that my skin slightly more oily and heavier feeling but it’s not visibly noticeable. I do tend to wash my face earlier than normal at night when I’m wearing it. Another thing I will love about this sunscreen is its clean formula, which I will feel good about in the summertime when I will swim in lakes and the ocean! Overall, I'm happy with this sunscreen and will likely purchase it again.

This is the ONLY SPF lotion I've ever used that does the job to the dot. It is nothing but perfection. I have seborrheic dermatitis and it's been very safe to use. I apply it every hour (outdoors) and every couple of hours (indoors) on both face and hands. Never caused any irritation, redness, acne, or any other skin issue. Doesn't leave a white cast at all and gives a beautiful glow. The price is reasonable compared to other Supergoop products that contain SPF. I keep it with me everywhere I go so I wish Supergoop would make a mini size of this. Hiiighly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this on my body, I don't like the way it feels on my face, it feels heavy and makes my face look oily. I prefer the Unseen sunscreen for my face, but my boy friend uses this for his face all summer and all winter as well.

reviews.review_title: Perfect sunscreen for dry skin and dark skin tones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It blends into darker skin tones perfectly with spf 50 coverage, its also water resistant which helps if you sweat a lot. It’s also perfect for dry skin types I always have a healthy glossy glow/shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With a lot of mixed reviews on this sunscreen I knew I was taking a chance, but it's a good brand and has a high spf, so I gave it a try. I wanted to love it... but it is extremely greasy on the face. I tried to let it soak into my skin before applying my makeup, and granted it doesn't pill underneath, but the greasiness shows through my mattifying makeup. My neck and face still feel sticky after an hour of trying to let it absorb. Fine for the body or for beach days, definitely not an every day wear.
It is too oily and heavy. I don't recommend it at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been consistently using this product everyday for the last ?1.5-2 years. This is the only sunscreen I have ever used that does not give me white bumps, breakouts, leaving skin cakey or pilling. And anytime someone is close enough to me - they comment that I SMEL GOOD.  This has really worked for my skin. If anything it gives me a really nice glow and absorbs well. And the su protextion is great. To clean, I use an oil cleanser (:sometimes with a makeup eraser cloth if it’s really heavy makeup or grime) and then follow with simple face wash like khirls, skin fix+. It can be a bit slippery / dewy under makeup - but I don’t use foundation, so it’s not a problem. But I could see this not being a great primer for full coverage?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me.left my face so greasy.I guess it would work for other parts of the body but not face
Loved it the first time i tried it!!! Will buy it again for sure!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely best sunscreen I’ve ever used. It’s hydrating enough that it keeps my skin plump in the colder months. In the warmer months I make sure to have a lighter moisturizer to balance the textures.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight and does not leave white sheen. Leaves skin with dewy finish. Great as base for makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Second time purchasing it, I love it. I would say I only use it as my fall/winter sunscreen because I have an oily tzone and it's a bit too shiny for summer use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t tried many sunscreens, so I can’t make any comparisons. But I do know that this is very lightweight and not greasy, which is essential for an oily gal like myself. My skin soaks this up instead of sitting on the surface of my face. No white cast, no pulling (even under makeup) and no grease? Yes please. The only slight problem is that this is lightly fragranced, so it smells like citrus. Aside from that I would definitely reccomend, especially if you have oily skin and are in search of a sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight. Hydrating. ZERO white cast and works well under makeup. Fresh scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love the smell, hydration, and shine after each time I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best sunscreen for the body I've ever used so far... Pleasant fragrance, good cover and no white cast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the sunscreen as it doesn’t give me white cast and doesn’t start peeling. Only complain I have is ut is little oily for sometime

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great sunscreen for the body AND face. I know it's usually recommended for the body, but I've had no issues using it with makeup and reapplying it. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its a heavy sunscreen and makes my skin very oily. I expected more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: No white cast, perfect for everyday use under makeup etc. Sent is nice and is not irritating to my skin (decently sensitive). Overall would recommend good price point for the product as well!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this has become my new everyday sunscreen! it’s not white cast and has a nice scent with a hint of citrus. my only complaint is that it is a bit greasy once it’s on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for a trip to Jamaica. I have porcelain skin while my husband has olive European/middle Eastern skin. He used a legacy brand, also SPF 50 and he got severe burns after 3 days. I used this product for a week and didn't get burned at all. Well worth the money. I'll definitely be rebuying again and again. Can't recommend it enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this everyday.  I like how it sinks into my skin and doesn’t leave a white cast on my face.  I ran out last week and bought a drug store brand.  Used the drug store brand and after one use was ordering my super goop.   This is a must

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing sunscreen! Great coverage and protection. I have dry skin and find this moisturizing. With this product I can skip my day moisturizer and my skin feels hydrated. I’ve had no break outs from this product. One of the rare sunscreens that I don’t breakout with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s just OK. Super greasy on the face and I have a dry skin type. If your hair is in your face it’ll pick up grease from the sunscreen. Ended up using it on my body but it’s a pricy sunscreen to be putting all over your body. It does go on clear.

reviews.review_title: Pleasant smell and texture, goes on clear
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice consistency, goes on clear, nice smell it is not overpowering. I mostly just use it for my face, you still get a tan with it on so not sure it is actually protection of 50 but it is light-weight and pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t normally write reviews but I seriously love this sunscreen - both for face and body. I have really dry skin and this holds in the moisturizer from my other products and gives such a natural dewy glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's amazing! It is cheaper than the unseen sunscreen but gives you too much of shine (for my liking) so if you're going to buy this, make sure you set your face with powder!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't cause break outs and left a glowy shiny finish, but it felt tacky on my skin so I had to wash it off after an hour or so

reviews.review_title: Not for my sensitive skin. Not for the price.Sorry
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It leaves my face with a nice glow. & unfortunately flares up my rosacea after using it for multiple days I noticed some milia on my cheeks. BUT apparently this sunscreen is at the bottom of  the supergoop sunscreen list.. apparently what the sephora representative was mentioning was the Zinc sunscreen was a lot better.. It looked tinted though & caused white cast. I'll try my luck with a different brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Moisturizing and wears well under makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: DO NOT USE WITH BLOND EXTENSIONS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

And once it’s done it’s super hard (read: near impossible) to correct. Save yourself a lot of $ and trouble and find a good mineral sunscreen to keep your hair looking good all summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

I no longer wear foundation throughout the day so I cannot speak to how it is under primer or foundation but as a stand alone on the skin for when you feel like going bare faced it feels amazing, very light and airy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

The sunscreen smell was not overwhelming at all and was easy to apply. I did have to shack it before applying, but overall I would highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly have tried only two sunscreens that have worked for me and is wearable. This is one of them. I like this one because it is affordable and it doesn’t sting the eyes well my eyes personally. White cast no where to be found and I found if I do proper skincare and use the two finger method with this. I have the best glow like it’s crazy. But i also feel it makes my skin a bit oily. I have combination skin not sensitive but I have been tackling dry skin and this helps my skin feel better. I would buy it again if i don’t find something better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Not for daily use on face but ok for outdoors!
